About

Me

My name is Cobb (or cobbland or cobb-dot-land).

I’m a writer, artist, programmer, and game designer currently dwelling in the foothills of Appalachia.

This website

This website was mostly crafted by hand in HTML and CSS using VSCodium and generated using 11ty. It's hosted on Netlify and deployed from Github (for now).
